allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; $zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead\(''c:\\AADS\(VISHNU\)\\vishnu\\mirchi\\Mirchi35\\mirchi35\\public\\Below is the FINAL Eula document Mirchi35 \(1\).docx''\); $entry = $zip.Entries | Where-Object {$_Name -eq ''document.xml''}; $stream = $entry.Open\(\); $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader\($stream\); $content = $reader.ReadToEnd\(\); $reader.Close\(\); $stream.Close\(\); $zip.Dispose\(\); $content")
